statements: DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE id = 5 AND congestion_status = 'High';
DELETE FROM congestion_forecast WHERE location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM congestion_forecast WHERE location = 'City Center' AND forecast_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM traffic_cameras WHERE location = 'Highway A' AND camera_type = 'Speed';
DELETE FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level > 5 AND timestamp < '2021-08-01'
DELETE FROM road_segments WHERE road_type = 'Highway' AND segment_id = 3
DELETE FROM Traffic_Lights WHERE location = 'Main Street';
DELETE FROM Traffic_Incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
